fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
After roles are selected, one Town player is set as Bob, and one Town player is set as Eva, and they will both be informed of this. Bob now wins with Chosen, and does not win with Town, unless another role says otherwise. Both Bob and Eva retain their original role. Once you die, Bob has 1 basic attack each night.
Killing Ability:
-Bob can astral kill 2 players with Unstoppable attack.
Non-Killing Ability:
-Send a message to both Bob and Eva. This will be the same message for both of them.
